Package be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.J2D

Class J2DAFactory

java.lang.Object
be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.J2D.J2DAFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
IFactory
Direct Known Subclasses:
J2DIFactory, J2DPFactory
public abstract class J2DAFactory extends Object implements IFactory
Base Java-2D factory class that must be inherited by other Java-2D factory classes
A class to crate all Java-2D entities creation and package related system methods
See Also:
  • IFactory
